title: ‘The TV Breakaway Is Dead’: Has This Tour de France Lost its Spark?
content:
'You’re better off saving your energy for when it counts': Too many sprint teams, flatter terrain doom breakaways on transition stages so far in this Tour de France.

Read the full article at ‘The TV Breakaway Is Dead’: Has This Tour de France Lost its Spark? on Velo.
author: ahood
